general_advisory: As per the extended range forecast (date :-06.02 .2025 ) of IMD, MC, Bhubaneswar, dry weather is very likely to prevail over the districts of Odisha during week -1 (7th to 13th February , 2025 ) and minimum temperature is very likely to be normal to below normal over the districts of Coastal Odisha and districts adjoining Coastal Odisha...

advisory: In transplanted rice, application of 35 kg urea per acre should be advised as first top dressing at 20 -25 days after transplanting or maximum tillering stage.
In just transplanted field use 3 pheromone traps with 5mg lure/acre in the rice field for monitoring of the yellow stem borer and leaf folder.
If sucking insect attack is noticed in Green/Black gram field then farmers should use 8 nos. of yellow sticky trap per acre to control these insect at vegetative stage.
If sucking insect attack is noticed in Green/Black gram field then farmers should use 8 nos. of yellow sticky trap per acre to control these insect at vegetative stage.
Prevailing increasing temperature condition may accelerate the Mango Hopper attack in orchard so its regular monitoring should be advised.
To control leaf eating caterpillar and fruit borer/shoot and fruit borer in Tomato and Brinjal, spraying of Emamectin Benzoate @ 0.4 g per liter of water should be advised.
Looking to the increase in temperature in upcoming week, farmers are advised to increase the fresh clean drinking water supply to the animals.
Vaccination against FMF, HS, BQ etc. should be advised. Deworming of animals is advised to control harmful worm.
